body_html:
@LANRRI If you cannot run the validation code, there must be errors in your installation. I recommend you to reinstall the tensorflow in this case.

https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#validate_your_installation

import tensorflow as tf
hello = tf.constant('Hello, TensorFlow!')
sess = tf.Session()
print(sess.run(hello))

body:
@LANRRI If you cannot run the validation code, there must be errors in your installation. I recommend you to reinstall the tensorflow in this case.

[https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#validate_your_installation](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#validate_your_installation)

```
import tensorflow as tf
hello = tf.constant('Hello, TensorFlow!')
sess = tf.Session()
print(sess.run(hello))
```
